lead: Walking with a Smile wasn't built from a textbook. It came from real life, from knowing what it's like when your past takes up more room than your present, and from figuring out that it doesn't have to stay that way.
subtitles: We're not here to tell you what healing should look like. We've learned the hard way that everyone's path is different.
And the only real expert on your life? That's you.
